list.name: itinerary_id
list.query: SELECT itinerary_id FROM baggage.itinerary_status WHERE journey_state IN ('AT_RISK_FOR_CONNECTION','DELAYED_OR_REROUTED','EXCEPTION') ORDER BY latest_event_time DESC LIMIT 100

targets.query: SELECT itinerary_id, journey_state, risk_reason, latest_event_time, bags_total, current_leg_index FROM baggage.itinerary_status WHERE journey_state IN ('AT_RISK_FOR_CONNECTION','DELAYED_OR_REROUTED','EXCEPTION') ORDER BY latest_event_time DESC LIMIT 100
SELECT bag_id, flight_id, airport, event_type, event_time, leg_index FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE itinerary_id='${itinerary_id}' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT formatDateTime(created_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') AS time, severity, payload FROM baggage.alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 200
